name: databricks-ads-session
description: Conduct Azure Databricks Architecture Design Sessions (ADS). Orchestrate a structured, multi-turn conversation to gather solution requirements, then generate a Databricks-centric architecture diagram.

tools.name: generate_architecture
tools.description: Generate a Mermaid architecture diagram for a given Databricks pattern. Patterns: medallion, streaming, ml-platform, data-mesh, migration, dwh-replacement, iot, hybrid.

params.description: Optional JSON string of custom parameters for the pattern generator
